Text: Herbert Molinas current search campaign Cc I good friend at Sun suggested me to contact all of you at Enron in regard to the direction of my current searching campaign as I have made the decision to leave my post as Vice President and General Manager of Network Associates Latin America and Caribbean It is of my understanding that Enron is undergoing a huge internal transformation to become one of the leading ECommerce players worldwide Network Associates is the leading and independent provider of total security software solutions to monitor and protect telecommunications ECommerce and internet applications worldwide Since I was given the mission to start the region in I have been instrumental to increase sales from M to M US in years I have been in charge of supervising and managing over employees across the region and the US with complete PL responsibilities Previous to join NAI I worked for Seagate where I had the responsibilitity to set up the whole supply chain in South Florida and and across the region resulting in a sales increase from M to M US in years With over years of experience selling and transfering technology internationally I feel proud of my record and accomplishments Should any of you be interested in talking to me about any opportunity within any of your organizations please do not hesitate to call me at Thank you in advance for your positive consideration Best regards Herbert Arturo Molina

Herbert Molina exiting Network Associates Cc Just a few lines to let you know about my decision to leave my position as Vice President and General Manager Latin America and Caribbean at Network Associates I am aware about Enrons current and future expansion plans in the IT arena worldwide and there is no a doubt in my mind that you are in need of good telented people to help you growing your overall IT business I am attaching to this email a copy of my Resume outlining my qualifications for your review and consideration Please feel free to contact me at should any of you have a questions Looking forward to talking to all of you soon Best regards Herbert Arturo Molina HerbertPDF

Herbert Molina exiting Network Associates Cc Just a few lines to let you know about my decision to leave my position as Vice President and General Manager Latin America and Caribbean at Network Associates I am aware about Enrons current and future expansion plans in the IT arena worldwide and there is no a doubt in my mind that you are in need of good telented people to help you growing your overall IT business I am attaching to this email a copy of my Resume outlining my qualifications for your review and consideration Please feel free to contact me at should any of you have a questions Looking forward to talking to all of you soon Best regards Herbert Arturo Molina HerbertPDF
